body.name: Tide Simply + Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent, 96 loads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 30 mins
features: 2X Oxi Fighting Power*. (*Stain removal of 1 dose vs 2 doses of the leading detergent with baking soda and Oxi)
Attacks Stains. Odor Out. Low Price.
Works with HE and standard machines.
Tide Simply Plus Oxi provides outstanding cleaning performance in front and top loading washing machines.
body.description: Tide Simply Plus Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent fights stains and odors with twice the Oxi fighting power (1), where all you need is one dose per load with no need to pretreat. Tide Simply Plus Oxi targets those tough odors deep in the fibers of your clothes, and is available at a great low price. The Refreshing Breeze scent infuses your clothes with floral, fruity and woody notes for a fresh, clean scent every time. It works with both HE and standard washing machines. (1) Stain removal of 1 dose vs 2 doses of the leading detergent with baking soda and Oxi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good cleaning ability, scent is prevalent but not too bad. But irritates sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: I've used Tide laundry detergent since I can remember growing up in the 60's. It's whole marketing pitch was that it was the best at getting stains out, and clothes clean. I think it mostly fulfilled that claim, but the perfumes and additives were nothing I cared for and possibly worse. When Tide came out with Free & Gentle (sp?), I used it mostly for the last 20 years or so (the pods for convenience). It seemed to be the best overall in my near 60 years of experience to date. 7-2023Lately, In order to save money, I searched for the "perfume/dye-free" version of Tide for less money since I can no longer afford what I could. I purchased this Tide with Oxi hoping it would be okay. Sadly, ... it seems to come close to the cleaning power Tide has been known for, BUT it has a scent I would NEVER go back to. I think this product and marketing still targets young people on a budget that think it "smells clean", and don't care much about added chemicals. Until they realize it might be important to look at a laundry detergent with less chemicals that are usually not so good for your skin and body, this detergent seems like a good choice. In the future, you might possibly attract a partner who doesn't think the smell of Tide is meant to be your hygiene statement...let alone a slice of your personal style. If you're young, and you can listen to a smart guy, you won't wait too long for the future.ss

reviews.reviewText: Lot's of He grade detergent for reasonable price

reviews.reviewText: I find this Tide works well for top load washer. Whatever I toss in washer it comes out clean. I do have to use more than is recommended but my water is hard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fourth Generation Tide User
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I tried the cheaper brands in my young married life. The commercial where they show you how much water is in the "other brands" is oh, so true. No matter how much of the cheaper brands you use in the washer, nothing really seems to get clean. So even though a jug is cheaper per jug, you are using lors and lots more of it, lugging in multiple jugs at a time. Then back to Tide and stains that the cheaper brads left in your laundry for months and months are suddenly gone, For tough stains, I use Tide directly on the stain, with or without a little water, let it soak ii and work overnight and when I wash it the next day, most stains are gone and forgotten.And when I found it online here for an eve better price than most of the local grocery stores, and delivered to my door, I became a regular customer.
Excelente producto. No necesitas usar mucho para que lave bien la ropa. Un súper plus es que huele muy bien y no necesitas suavizantes.
